snippet.title: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector - Xbox @ Gamescom 2023 Showcase Reveal
snippet.description:
Set your eyes starward. Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector will launch on Xbox Series X|S consoles and with Xbox Game Pass for console, PC, and cloud on day one!

Roleplaying on the edge of a system in crisis. You are an escaped android, with a malfunctioning body, a price on your head and no memory of your past. Get a ship, find a crew, and keep both running as you navigate the shifting landscape of the Starward Belt. Can you build refuge among the stars?

Wishlist now on Xbox: https://bit.ly/CS2Xbox 
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/cQVRmjMVPj
Sign-up to the Jump Over the Age newsletter: https://jumpovertheage.substack.com/
